content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Mr. Abbasi,

Let's start with a high price to negotiate from. How about 2500 euros per month? Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive for an unfurnished apartment. I would like to propose 1500 euros per month instead. It is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but 1500 euros per month is far too low for such a prime location. Given the apartment's condition and location, I am willing to compromise at 2000 euros per month. Let's see if we can find a middle ground between your offer and my counteroffer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Let's meet halfway. How about 1750 euros per month? It's a reasonable price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While 1750 euros per month is closer to my expectations, I still believe it undervalues the apartment's worth. Given its prime location and condition, I am willing to compromise at 1900 euros per month. This should provide you with a good deal, while also ensuring I, as the landlord, receive a fair price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding. Let's meet halfway again. How about 1825 euros per month? It's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center, and it's closer to your offer.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I can see you are persistent in your negotiations. 1825 euros per month is still lower than my desired price, but I can accept it as a fair compromise. I agree to the price of 1825 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1825] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1825] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for agreeing to the price of 1825 euros per month. The apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. If you have any questions or concerns, please let me know.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for understanding my perspective. I am pleased with the agreement, and I look forward to our collaboration. Should there be any further concerns or questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
